item.title: Vim Undo Branches
item.description: You can undo and redo changes without having to press u or CTRL-R repeatedly. Retrieve the state of your buffer as it was some time ago. This concept is called undo tree or undo branches. See :help undo-branches. Moving through the undo tree Go to older text state (10 minutes before) :earlier 10m Go to newer text state (5 minutes later) :later 5m
